Detailed Description

Base class for all pieces on board.

Each piece should provide information about color(). For identification in QML piece provides string type().

Also piece should provide information about possible moves via moves() call. ChSimpleValidator and ChHumanPlayer use this information, but in general player (inherited from ChPlayer) and/or validator (inherited from ChValidator) may not use this function and follow the own rules.

Piece implements pattern FlyWeight. Piece does not store it's coordinates but uses information provided via parameters of moves() call.
